name: Cat Sacks
description:
Find the missing Cat & Kitt Scouts in this cozy, silly hidden object point & click demo!

Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats in four catastical worlds*.

It's the annual Catawauloo camping trip at Farmer Calico's farm! The cat scouts are excited to earn new badges and play their favorite games, especially the big sack race!

Locate all the cats to give them their race sacks before a big autumn storm rolls in...and some unexpected guests drop by?

What will the future full game include?

  • Multiple colorful worlds to search & explore
  • A menagerie of fuzzy friends & out of this world visitors
  • Real life kitty voice actors, original music & twists on old favorites
  • Secrets to find & puzzles to uncover
  • Easter eggs, easter eggs, easter eggs
  • And more!
Can't believe this is real!

Hi, I'm Comma Crash, the Old Cat Lady behind CatSacks.

I’m excited, and - let’s be honest, a little terrified, to be announcing my first ever real video game. Who could have ever predicted that winning a Tandy TRS80 in a coloring contest from Radioshack back in the 80's would lead to this? I made this game primarily to learn the programming language C# and the Unity engine but after receiving positive feedback from others, decided to make it something to share. Along with the audio finesesses of SpongeCC, we hope you enjoy this taste of kitty goodness and will help us make the full game a reality!

~Want the handcrafted catbutt drink coasters featured in the video?
~Want to see your floofy friend in the game?
Please check out our CatStarter... er... Kickstarter!

*This Demo includes two levels of the first world.

**Please note, the download is code-signed but not by a main authority so you may get a Windows Defense Security pop up.
